item.title: Police say around 10 people killed in Sweden school campus shooting
item.description: Prime Minister Ulf Kristersson described Tuesday's attack as the "worst mass shooting in Swedish history".

item.title: Palestinian gunman kills Israeli soldiers as UN warns over W Bank operation
item.description: A Palestinian opened fire at a checkpoint in Tayasir, killing two soldiers and wounding eight.

item.title: Man accused of blinding Salman Rushdie goes on trial
item.description: Hadi Matar denies charges of attempted murder and assault for the August 2022 attack.

item.title: Thousands evacuate Santorini as earthquakes strike island
item.description: Hundreds of earthquakes have rattled the island since Sunday, leading emergency flights to be scheduled.

item.title: How does fentanyl get into the US?
item.description: President Trump has blamed China for its opioid crisis and imposed sweeping tariffs.
